title: Strange New Worlds - Sci-Fi Loops Pack
description: This pack contains 10 deep and immersive background music tracks, created to accompany projects that require ethereal, ambient, and relaxing feel to them.
longDescription:
This loop pack was created with SPACE in mind! The choice of lush, reverberated instruments, along with their combinations, were carefully tailored to instantly deliver that wide and dreamy feel needed for your next sci-fi game project. We could definitely imagine it being used during the gameplay or in the main menu of a puzzle, arcade, RPG, or any kind of futuristic-themed game! Of course, this pack is suitable for a wide variety of different uses, not necessarily tied to game development projects.


Preview available on our official SoundCloud channel here:

https://soundcloud.com/cyberwave-orchestra/sets/strange-new-worlds-sci-fi-loops-pack
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  Ambient Doom (3:16) - (Only track that is not a loop in this pack)
  •  Dark Sci-Fi Atmosphere (1:58)
  •  Deep Space Species (2:08)
  • Digital Planet (1:06)
  • Mysterious Planet (2:08)
  • Sci Fi Credits Loop (1:16)
  • Sci Fi Space Planet (2:08)
  • Space Atmosphere (1:52)
  • Space Exploration (2:08)
  • Space Opera (2:00)


Number of Audio Wavs: 10

Number of Audio Cues: 10

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Does music loop: 9/10 tracks are loops.

Minutes of audio provided: 20:02

Supported Development Platforms: All


Thank You!
